title: Online Intensive Training for Movement Disorder Assessment Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Degree in Physical Therapy, Rehabilitation Medicine, or Biomedical Engineering, with Foundational Knowledge of Motor Function Assessment
context.additional_context: Short-term expert course utilizing smartphone-based real-time video lectures and mobile-optimized educational materials

learning_goals: Distinguish and explain at least three types of motor impairment assessment protocols
Analyze motor function abnormalities with 80% accuracy using video recordings captured by smartphones
Demonstrate clinical judgment based on European standard motor impairment assessment guidelines at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
